timeline.message: Validate openapi in different phase, use temp TRS openapi

timeline.bodyText:
this seems like a pretty long test testing a variety of operations
can it be broken up rather than disabling the whole thing?
timeline.author: denis-yuen

replies.bodyText: It's going to take quite a long time to figure out what's wrong with this test.  Considering it's been broken on develop for the past 4 commits, it seems irrelevant to the PR.
replies.author: garyluu

replies.bodyText: Agreed, I think it should be fixed in a separate PR.
replies.author: denis-yuen
